column1: What you pay for your Part D
Are you currently getting help to pay for your drugs?
If you are in a program that helps pay for your drugs
Evidence of Coverage about the costs for Part D prescription drugs may not apply
to you. We have included a separate insert
for People Who Get Extra Help Paying for Prescription Drugs” (also known as the “Low
Income Subsidy Rider” or the “LIS Rider”)
column2: which tells you about your drug coverage.

column1: If you don’t have this insert
column2: please call Customer Service and ask for the “LIS Rider.”
